content.question: Primary producers in a lake ecosystem store approximately <math alttext="25,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mtext>,000</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of energy in their biomass. Which of the following identifies the most likely amount of energy available to a tertiary consumer in this ecosystem?

choices.label: <math alttext="25 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mtext> kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="250 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>250</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext>kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2,500 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext>,500</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="25,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mtext>,000</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="25 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mtext> kcal/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
